summary: This document is an email correspondence between Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey for the week of October 8, 2013. The email indicates that Jeffrey is hesitant to make a decision about the meeting time until the following week.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey and communicates the tentative nature of the scheduling.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling the meeting and provides options for the timing.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is the individual with whom the meeting is being scheduled, but his full name is not provided.

connections.description: Lesley and Amanda are working together to schedule a meeting with Jeffrey.
Amanda is organizing a meeting that Jeffrey is expected to attend.
Lesley is also involved in the organization of the meeting with Jeffrey.

events.title: Tentative Meeting with Jeffrey
events.description: A breakfast meeting is tentatively scheduled for October 10, 2013, pending confirmation from Jeffrey.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are coordinating a meeting with an individual named Jeffrey.
The meeting is tentatively set for October 10, 2013, but Jeffrey has not confirmed his availability.
Amanda Kirby's assistant indicated that an 8 AM breakfast meeting would work for the date proposed.
